title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Visitor Center  The Visitor Center (223 N. Main) in Independence is open daily from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Visitors can view an orientation film about Harry Truman and his life in Independence, see exhibits featuring Truman family treasures, and browse the book store. Call 816-254-9929 for more information. Truman Home Tickets to tour the Truman Home (219 N. Delaware) must be purchased in the Visitor Center. The Truman Home is closed for tours on Mondays from Nov.1 to Memorial Day. The Noland Home (216 N. Delaware) is open daily from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m for self-guided tours.   Truman Farm Home The Truman Farm Home in Grandview, Missouri is located at 12301 Blue Ridge Blvd. Grounds are open daily year-round for self-guided tours. Audio tour available onsite.  Truman Farm Home is closed at this time.  Â     Tour the historic Truman Home in Independence! NPS Photo
